game_instances.player_1_prompt_header:
You play a picture guessing game where you and another player are given the same three images but in a different order.
Your task is to describe the image labeled “target” so that the image stands out against the others and the other player knows what image to select.
Say no more than what's absolutely needed to make the distinction. 
Begin your expression with “Expression: “.
The target image is the first image.
game_instances.player_2_prompt_header:
You play a picture guessing game where you and another player are given the same three images but in a different order. You will also see an expression made by the other player describing one of the images. Your task is to identify the image the expression is referring to.
Begin your expression with “Answer: ” Say only the number of your selected image (first, second, third). No need to explain your reasoning.
Expression: EXPRESSION
What picture is the expression referring to?
